doc.title: Pink Suds
doc.plot: The Pink Panther visits the laundromat. He has trouble getting his laundry inside the washing machine, since it keeps coming up from another machine. While struggling with this problem, the panther gets stuck in a bucket. With only his hands and feet sticking out, he attracts the attention of a little dog, who barks angrily at the bucket that runs, slaps his face and gets him wet with a fire hydrant. When the little pointy-nosed man walks into the laundromat, more mishaps occur with a soap vending machine, a vat full of starched water, and the laundromat getting flooded with soap.
